name: The Deep Dark (JEFFTheDev)
description:
Inside the confines of a flooded mineshaft, you must manage your oxygen, use lights and weld your way out of a maze. Amidst the ruins you may find there's something else lurking in the deep dark...

Controls

- "WASD" to move
- Hold "Space" to ascend
- Hold "Shift" to descend
- Press "F" to use a flashlight
- Hold "E" to check your oxygen
- Hold "Right mouse button" to equip the gas torch
- Then hold "Left mouse button" to use it
- Press "C" to drop a chemlight
